data.title: Local favorite
data.text: Great Mexican dishes with their specialty being menudo. Authentic Mexican food but also serves up some great tasting cheeseburgers! Service is good .

data.title: Wow! 24 hr hole in the wall
data.text:
This place was great.  My husband and I were initially going to IHOP or Dennys but we figured let's try something new.  And we were glad.  They have menudo every day, they are are open 24/7 and their food was really good.

We came here for breakfast.  I had the menudo and my husband had the Lucky breakfast.

The only downfall to my plate is they served it with grilled buttered hot dog bread instead of torillas.  It came with the mohogony and pork.  This is odd to find.  Most places give you one or the other. I ordered a small one and got full.  

My husband had 2 eggs, 3 pancakes, and 3 slices of bacon with an horchata.   The pancakes were not fluffy, but they were not super thin.  They were medium thickness.  He wasn't asked how he wanted his eggs, but he got them over medium.   The bacon was a bit on the crunchy side, but delicious.

This place is very small and was packed.   It is a bit tricky to find parking, but as ppl were finishing up their meals new customers were sitting.  It was constant movement and all the workers were busy.   There was no standing around waiting to find a seat.  If I were in the area again, I would defenitely come again.

data.title: Best Salsa
data.text: Had the Mexican plate. Really good Chile rellno and tacos. Enchiladas I did not care for. Some of the best Salsa I have had. I actually bought some to go it was that good. It's got a bite.

data.title: 24hr Cafe and we really got lucky to find it.
data.text: The breakfast was great, I really loved the hash browns and the coffee was perfect. My server was very nice at 3:00am. I had to fly out of El Paso at 6:30am so this place is a perfect little stop.

data.title: Take out
data.text: We stopped by to pick up some take out. Place was not so clean. We weren't sure if the cook was paying us any attention because he is the one that you give your order to. He  got our order right and they aren't greedy with their food because it was a lot. The food was actually very good.

data.title: Hole in the wall
data.text: If you are not a knowledgable local you'll not know about it! The Menudo is one of the best I've found on El Paso!!! Caldo de Rez was great. Prices are more then reasonable. Diner style service. The other night a Car club stopped by for meals! Menu is both Mexican and some American choices. An enjoyable evening.

data.title: False advertisement no food available
data.text: Like one of the older reviews says bad to poor service from the  lady short hair ordered the chile relleno burrito and nothing available for that also ordered tacos de barbacoa and the menu was wrong according to the lady

data.title: Small but Good food.
data.text: It is a small little place but cozy and the food is made right there in front of you.  I like the menudo and the beef tacos are great. It has been in the same location since I was a child.

data.title: Avoid! !!!
data.text:
Honestly the food is good. But as soon u come in and if u saw the two blond ladies run!!!
Their service is the worst I have ever gotten
they don't care maybe they are owners
Or just every time they have a bad day!!
Been there several times and yes the food is good but have to wait 20+ for a drink?

The place its 24/7,
So after a bad night it does help
But if you can go somewhere else 

Please do yourself a favor and GO!!!

data.title: Mine was great, his was not...
data.text: I LOVED the Huevos A La Mexicana, the dish was PERFECT and I left very fulfilled, however my husband did not care for the eggs and bacon.  He felt the bacon was not cooked enough and the scrambled eggs cooked too much.  One downside of an open kitchen is that you can see all...sometimes there are things I do not want to see/know.  For example, there was a dish that was completed before the whole table order was completed so the cook stuck it in the microwave to warm it up again.  I like to think my food is fresh, not being re heated on a plastic plate in the microwave (I hate to think of the plastic chemicals being released into my food).  The service was efficient and friendly.  The coffee was pretty bad.

data.title: Open 24/7
data.text: Trying to start out on a good note, they are open 24/7. Food very up and down, one day had very good deshebrada tacos, the next a very tough bistek torta. The service is good and friendly but it may depend on the grill cook on that particular day. Cheap menu, cash only.

data.title: Review for luckys the green building! And not the good luck cafe
data.text:
People are confusing good luck cafe which is whie building with blue letters with luckys which is the green building. Its comfusing because they are next to each other. Anyways  This review is for luckys. 

This place Luckys the green building is a mexican place, which means mexicans work their and might not speak english, however the food is very good and its cheap. Its always full and sometimes the tabels arent very clean because everyone is too busy but they will clean it up as soon as they notice you and apologize and they are so polite very good people, the food takes a while to be ready since its made as you oder right their. Its nothing fancy, you can say its a cheap version of dennys with only mexican options. I like it. After clubs and wasting money good food for cheap prizes couldnt be better

data.title: Open 24/7. good place for after the bar.
data.text: You never know who you might run into at this place after the bars close.  Popular late night hangout.  Good breakfast and ok Mexican food.

data.title: SABENA- such a bad experience... never again
data.text: awful food & table was not clean at all.  The only way a trucker would stop here is if they ran out of fuel in front of the bldg & were lost

data.title: The longest waits ever!!! Greasy drunkard food!!
data.text: If you are wasted beyond belief, need a place that will feed you after the bars close down and do not mind bad slow service, then by all means go. It's just an awful little place, it's so bad that the transvestites that eat here are the only thing that give the place that extra special something. I mean the food is ok if you are drunk and the waiting for your food seems like an eternity.

data.title: Excelente menudo
data.text: El menudo de este lugar es el mejor de todo el universo esta delicioso de hecho desde que mi esposa estuboi embarazada se le antojaba un menudo y acudiamos cpon regularidad a comer o cenar o desayunar delicoso
